channel.title: Friend List Fix (Free Admin + Max stats on my server for help)
channel.description:
The friends list on my P16 based server says loading list please wait, but when you add people they are green and it shows xxxx has logged in.
Free J Admin account on WorldScape if anyone can fix it :)

item.title: Friend List Fix (Free Admin + Max stats on my server for help)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Still need answer lol heres some pics:
Fearscape server:

The friends list works 100%, World-1 is online, World-8 is offline.

My Server:

First, I added Testdude to my list. Then i logged out and in, and testdude logged in. It did not give a logged in message, and he was not a green dot. I tried to add him again, and it said “1912821424622 is already on your friendlist”.Then testdude2 logged in, and it said Testdude has logged in, and testdude2 was logged in. Someone please help me fix this! And heres the fearscape source:
http://allgofree.redirectme.net:3000/rs/fearscape.zip

Also Miss.SIlabsoft said something about the playerName being a long or string, and on both servers its a string, if that matters.

Read full topic
